basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Chris Rarig and welcome to my Portfolio!!! I am a Software Developer at Code Fellows with a specialization in Python. My background is in Business Analytics and Mathematics. Currently I am look for oportunities in a fun faced paced problem solving enviroment. Enjoy viewing my current and past work!!!

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: School project for a bakery that sells Salmon Cookies. Home landing page with text placeholders. Nav bar with Home and Sales page. Sales page with form that allows user to input sales for new stores

projects.title: Busmall
projects.description: School project that allowed users to vote on their favorite photos with a event handler click function. The users input is stored using local storage and the results are displayed in graph form after voting

projects.title: Coders Pursuit
projects.description: My first final project during my time at Code Fellows. This page was designed as a movie trivia game that allowed users to answer multiple choice trivia questions. Using local storage we stored the results of the questions and displayed a leaderboard for user comparison
